Hereunder latest news of the boy shot by police, given by Dr. Chung...the boy can survive, thank God

Yes the bullet just hit the lung, no major vascular injury. The condition is stabilised by putting in a chest drain and not much blood coming out from the drain. Therefore the bleeding is not life threatening and thank God the bullet just hit the lung
He need a open surgery to fix the bleeding and take out the bullet. The operation is not lethally dangerous, though still carrying some risk. If the operation is smooth, given his age and good general condition, thete is a good chance that he will survive.
I can assure everyone that QEH will give the best medical care to this boy and QEH are the most experienced hospital in handling this trauma case.
